movies.title: Le Garçon et la Bête
movies.plot: The latest feature film from award-winning Japanese director Mamoru Hosoda (Summer Wars, Wolf Children): When Kyuta, a young orphan living on the streets of Shibuya, stumbles into a fantastic world of beasts, he's taken in by Kumatetsu, a gruff, rough-around-the-edges warrior beast who's been searching for the perfect apprentice. Despite their constant bickering, Kyuta and Kumatetsu begin training together and slowly form a bond as surrogate father and son. But when a deep darkness threatens to throw the human and beast worlds into chaos, the strong bond between this unlikely family will be put to ultimate test-a final showdown that will only be won if the two can finally work together using all of their combined strength and courage.
movies.simplePlot: When a young orphaned boy living on the streets of Shibuya stumbles upon a fantastic world of beasts, he's taken in by a gruff warrior beast looking for an apprentice.

biography.bio: Bryn Apprill was born on January 29, 1996 in Plano, Texas, USA as Bryn Catherine Apprill. She is an actress, known for Le Garçon et la Bête (2015), Evangelion: 3.0 (2012) and One Piece Film: Gold (2016).
biography.name: Bryn Apprill

biography.bio: Kumiko Asô was born on June 17, 1978 in Sanbu-gun, Chiba, Japan as Kumiko Hiramaru. She is an actress, known for Kaïro (2001), Casshern (2004) and Dr. Akagi (1998). She has been married to Daisuke Iga since December 28, 2007.
biography.name: Kumiko Asô

biography.bio: Morgan Berry was born on April 27, 1992 in Riverside, California, USA as Morgan Lane Berry. She is an actor and singer known for her work in various anime television series, movies, and video games. She started pursuing voice acting in 2014 after winning a voice over competition at Todd Haberkorn's convention. She then went on to study the art of voice acting at KD Studio, and not too long after started voice acting at FUNimation that same year.
biography.name: Morgan Berry

biography.bio: Jessica Cavanagh is an actress, known for Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012), Le Garçon et la Bête (2015) and Fairy Tail: Priestess of the Phoenix (2012).
biography.name: Jessica Cavanagh

biography.bio: Luci Christian was born on March 18, 1973 in Houston, Texas, USA as Louisa Michelle Christian. She is an actress and writer, known for One Piece (1999), Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and Grave of the Fireflies (1988). She has been married to Michael Bell since 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Luci Christian

biography.bio: Lily Franky was born on November 4, 1963 in Fukuoka, Japan as Masaya Nakagawa. He is an actor and writer, known for Tel père, tel fils (2013), All Around Us (2008) and The Devil's Path (2013).
biography.name: Lily Franky

biography.bio: Josh Grelle was born on November 2, 1985 in Clifton, Texas, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Mass Effect: Paragon Lost (2012), Gatchaman (1972) and Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012).
biography.name: Josh Grelle

biography.bio: Sean Hennigan was born in Plano, Texas, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for 3:10 to Yuma (2007), Three Burials (2005) and The Life of David Gale (2003).
biography.name: Sean Hennigan

biography.bio: Suzu Hirose is an actress, known for Our Little Sister (2015), Chihayafuru Part II (2016) and Rage (2016).
biography.name: Suzu Hirose

biography.bio: Chuck Huber was born on May 8, 1971 in Chicago, Illinois, USA as Charles Cody Huber. He is an actor and producer, known for American Crime (2015), Attack on Titan (2013) and Dragon Ball Z: La Résurrection de 'F' (2015). He was previously married to Kirsten Fischer.
biography.name: Chuck Huber

biography.bio: Ivan Jasso is an actor, known for Echo 3 (2014), Le Garçon et la Bête (2015) and Pico de Gallo (2010).
biography.name: Ivan Jasso

biography.bio: Brittney Karbowski was born on June 26, 1986 in Sugar Land, Texas, USA as Brittney Marie Karbowski. She is an actress, known for Soul Eater (2008), Journey to Agartha (2011) and Puncture (2011). She has been married to Matthew Hernandez since 2013. They have one child.
biography.name: Brittney Karbowski

biography.bio: Haru Kuroki was born on March 14, 1990 in Osaka, Japan. She is an actress, known for Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012), La maison au toit rouge (2014) and A Bride for Rip Van Winkle (2016).
biography.name: Haru Kuroki

biography.bio: Mamoru Miyano was born on June 8, 1983 in Saitama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Death Note (2006), Steins;Gate (2011) and Wolf's Rain (2003).
biography.name: Mamoru Miyano

biography.bio: Aoi Miyazaki was born on November 30, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012), The Great Passage (2013) and Eureka (2000). She was previously married to Sôsuke Takaoka.
biography.name: Aoi Miyazaki
